name: SAMTA KENDRA
briefDescription: Adv. Kiran Dharma Channe is  Our Foundation's Founder And President.   Our Foundations Multi Purpose Aims and Objects Mainly Education,Health For All,Social,Urban And Rural,Yuths,Cultural,Sports and Spirituals,Socio Economy For Economy Weakers,Religious and Adhyatmik meditation like Vipassanya,Shramner.We Implement a Various Programme Like as Erradication of Supersticians,Save Earth,Water and Forest.
